navigationDescriptions.menus: Create and manage coffee shop menus
navigationDescriptions.salesTargets: Set daily sales targets for menu products
navigationDescriptions.operations: Sales recording, analytics, and operational tracking
navigationDescriptions.accounting: Comprehensive financial transaction management and accounting
navigationDescriptions.recurringExpenses: Manage monthly and yearly recurring operational expenses
navigationDescriptions.analytics: Product-specific income projections and profit analysis
navigationDescriptions.kwaciDemo: Explore KWACI acronym meanings and animations

plan.title: Plan
plan.description: Guided onboarding and operational planning for your coffee shop

journeyMap.title: Coffee Shop Setup Journey
journeyMap.description: Complete all 9 steps to fully set up your coffee shop operations
journeyMap.completeDescription: Congratulations! You've completed all setup steps for your coffee shop.

stepsMap.title: Journey Steps Map
stepsMap.description: Click on any unlocked step to view instructions and get started

guidedSteps.requirementsMet: Requirements met! You can mark this step as complete.
guidedSteps.tryAgain: Please try again or contact support.

planningDashboard.title: Planning Dashboard
planningDashboard.description: Create and manage daily, weekly, and monthly operational plans for your coffee shop

templates.title: Planning Templates
templates.description: Quick start templates for different planning scenarios

journey.title: Setup Journey Progress
journey.description: Complete your coffee shop setup journey to unlock advanced planning features
journey.incompleteDescription: Finish setting up your coffee shop to unlock all planning features and templates.
journey.completeDescription: Your coffee shop is fully set up. You can now create comprehensive operational plans.

createIngredient.title: Add Your First Ingredient
createIngredient.description: Start by adding an ingredient to your inventory. Ingredients are the building blocks for your products.
createIngredient.instructions: Go to the Ingredients section and click 'Add Ingredient'. Fill in the details and save.

createProduct.title: Create Your First Product
createProduct.description: Now create a product using your ingredients. Products are what you sell to customers.
createProduct.instructions: Go to the Products section, click 'Add Product', and define its composition.

createMenu.title: Build Your Menu
createMenu.description: Add your products to a menu so customers can order them.
createMenu.instructions: Navigate to Menus, create a new menu, and add products.

createBranch.title: Add a Branch
createBranch.description: Set up your first branch location for sales and operations.
createBranch.instructions: Go to Branches, click 'Add Branch', and enter the location details.

addProductToMenu.title: Add Product to Menu
addProductToMenu.description: Link your products to the menu for customer ordering.
addProductToMenu.instructions: Edit your menu and add the products you want to offer.

addItemToWarehouse.title: Stock Your Warehouse
addItemToWarehouse.description: Add items to your warehouse to track inventory levels.
addItemToWarehouse.instructions: Go to Warehouse, click 'Add Item', and specify quantities.

createProductionAllocation.title: Set Up Production Allocation
createProductionAllocation.instructions: Navigate to Production, create a batch, and allocate ingredients.

changeProductionBatchStatus.title: Update Production Batch Status
changeProductionBatchStatus.description: Track the progress of your production batches.
changeProductionBatchStatus.instructions: Go to Production, select a batch, and update its status.

recordSales.title: Record Your First Sale
recordSales.description: Start tracking sales to monitor business performance.
recordSales.instructions: Go to Sales, click 'Record Sale', and enter transaction details.

createSalesTarget.title: Set a Sales Target
createSalesTarget.description: Define daily sales goals for your team.
createSalesTarget.instructions: Go to Sales Targets, click 'Add Target', and set your goals.

recentPlans.title: Recent Plans
recentPlans.noPlansDescription: Create your first operational plan to get started with structured planning.

analytics.title: Planning Analytics
analytics.description: Overview of your planning performance and insights

dashboard.title: Business Dashboard
dashboard.description: Comprehensive overview of your business operations and performance
dashboard.dataUpdatesAutomatically: Dashboard data updates automatically when you switch business contexts

welcome.title: Welcome to KWACI Grow
welcome.selectBusiness: Please select a business from the sidebar to view your dashboard and start managing your operations.

dashboard.selectBusinessToView: Please select a business to view

hourlyChart.title: Hourly Sales Today
hourlyChart.description: Revenue and transaction distribution throughout the day

noData.title: No Sales Data
noData.description: No sales recorded for {{period}}. Start recording sales to see analytics here.

financialOverview.title: Financial Overview
financialOverview.description: Current financial position and cash flow insights

summary.title: Financial Health Summary
summary.description: Overview of your business financial position
summary.positiveCashFlow: Positive cash flow - business is generating more revenue than expenses
summary.negativeCashFlow: Negative cash flow - expenses exceed revenue, monitor closely
summary.focusOnRevenue: â€¢ Focus on increasing revenue or reducing expenses
summary.considerOptimization: â€¢ Consider cost optimization - runway is less than 3 months
summary.considerReinvestment: â€¢ Consider reinvesting profits for business growth
summary.immediateAttention: â€¢ Immediate attention needed - negative cash position

operationsStatus.title: Operations Status
operationsStatus.description: Production batches and operational workflow status

incompleteBatches.title: Incomplete Production Batches
incompleteBatches.description: Production batches that require attention or completion

emptyState.title: All Batches Complete
emptyState.description: No incomplete production batches. Great job keeping up with production!

noBusinessSelected.title: No business selected
noBusinessSelected.description: Please select a business to view operations status.

inventoryAlerts.title: Inventory Alerts
inventoryAlerts.description: Stock levels and low inventory warnings

lowStockIngredients.title: Low Stock Ingredients
lowStockIngredients.description: Ingredients that are below their low stock threshold

emptyState.title: All Stock Levels Good
emptyState.description: No ingredients are below their low stock threshold. Keep up the good inventory management!

noBusinessSelected.title: No business selected
noBusinessSelected.description: Please select a business to view inventory alerts.

branchPerformance.title: Branch Performance
branchPerformance.description: Sales performance comparison across branches for {{period}}

comparison.title: Branch Performance Comparison
comparison.description: Detailed performance metrics for each branch ({{period}})

emptyState.title: No Branch Data
emptyState.description: No branches found or no sales data available for the selected period.

noBusinessSelected.title: No business selected
noBusinessSelected.description: Please select a business to view branch performance.

description.line1: This is a sandbox environment where you can experiment with ingredient and product combinations
description.line2: to calculate Cost of Goods Sold (COGS) before committing data to your database.
description.line3: All data here is temporary until you choose to save it.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.description: Follow these steps to start experimenting with COGS calculations:

createIngredients.title: Create Ingredients
createIngredients.description: Add temporary ingredients with costs, quantities, and units

buildProducts.title: Build Products
buildProducts.description: Combine ingredients to create products and see real-time COGS

saveWhenReady.title: Save When Ready
saveWhenReady.description: When satisfied with your experiments, save to database

saveDialog.title: Save to Database
saveDialog.description: This will permanently save your temporary ingredients and products to the database. Only active items will be saved.
saveDialog.noDataDescription: Create some active ingredients or products first.

tempIngredientList.title: Temporary Ingredients
tempIngredientList.description: Create ingredients for COGS experimentation. These won't be saved to the database until you choose to save them.

tempProductList.title: Temporary Products
tempProductList.description: Create products with ingredient compositions for COGS experimentation. These won't be saved to the database until you choose to save them.
tempProductList.noIngredientsWarning: Create some active ingredients first before adding products.

tempIngredientForm.description: Create ingredients for COGS experimentation. This data is temporary and won't be saved to the database until you choose to save it.

tempProductForm.description: Create products with ingredient compositions for COGS experimentation. This data is temporary and won't be saved to the database until you choose to save it.
